text:
While speaking in English
we often compare contrast or we lay an

the emphasis we do this all the time we
connect

sentences using linking words they are
very important

as they help us express efficiently in
English.

There are two types of linking words
formal

and informal in this lesson we will look
at 'formal linking words'

Linking words help us to show the contrast
compare things show cause or reason they

show the result of an action and are
also

used to lay emphasis let's understand
them better

and learn how to use them in
conversations and writing

take a look at this sentence this
house was built in 1910 whereas the city

is modern in this sentence
whereas is used to contrast the first

part of the sentence
before the comma with the second part of

the sentence
it shows a contrast probably your house

is the oldest in the city
it's built in 1910 whereas the city

is now covered with tall skyscrapers it
has

new and modern infrastructure
here is the second sentence his blog

post was popular
and his speech was equally well liked

now in this sentence we are showing a
comparison

between the author's blog post and his
speech

they were equally good the word equally
compares the blog post and the author's

speech
you can also use linking words to show a

reason
look at this sentence video calls are

widespread
owing to global internet access

here the linking word owing to explains
why video calls

are popular the reason is internet
access is now available worldwide

see how linking words help you in
combining thoughts

in many different ways now let's see how
we can use

a linking word to show result of some
action

look at this sentence it's free to watch
and

upload videos on youtube hence it is
very popular

in this sentence we've used hence to
explain

give reasons why youtube is so popular
because it's free and of course

you like watching our english lessons
because you can learn english for free

now let's see how we can add emphasis to
a sentence using linking words

elon musk is known for his visionary
thinking

notably in the tech world by using the
linking word

notably we are trying to show that elon
musk

is famous in the tech world if we only
say the first part of the sentence

it's a general statement by using the
word notably

we emphasized to show that elon musk
is more famous and known in the tech

world
did you see how these small linking

words can help you express more
efficiently in spoken english

well we looked at five sentences
let us make this more exciting let's try

and change the linking word
without changing the meaning of the

sentence
this house was built in 1910

yet the city is modern we replaced
whereas with yet the meaning of the

sentence
hasn't changed it means the same thing

but you used a new linking word yet
his blog post was popular and his speech

was equally well liked
how can we replace the word equally

we can use the word similarly
his blog post was popular and his speech

was similarly well liked
you can either use equally or similarly

the meaning of the sentence won't change
video calls are popular owing to global

internet access
we can replace owing to with as a result

of
let's read the sentence video calls are

popular
as a result of global internet access

has the meaning changed no but you have
used a new linking word to express

why video calls are so popular
it's free to watch and upload videos

on youtube hence it's very popular
in this case let's use a linking phrase

to replace
hence we can say it's free to

watch and upload videos on youtube that
being the case

it's very popular the meaning remains
the same

i am sure youtube is popular as we spend
at least

two to three hours on youtube don't you
well if you are enjoying this video hit

the like button
subscribe to the channel and click the

bell so that you don't miss such
interesting english lessons next up

elon musk is known for his visionary
thinking

notably in the tech world we can use the
word

primarily instead of notably to lay
emphasis

the meaning doesn't change it shows that
elon musk is more famous in the tech

world for his visionary
thinking so we are almost at the end of

this lesson
let's quickly revise the linking words

you've learnt today
whereas yet similarly

equally owing to as a result of
hence that being the case

primarily notably
try using them in your english

conversations to sound expressive
and fluent that's all for today

i hope you found this lesson useful come
back for more lessons

keep learning keep practicing and take
good care of yourself bye
you
